org.jdrupes.httpcodec.fields.HttpField

    org.jdrupes.httpcodec

    • Uses of HttpField in org.jdrupes.httpcodec

      Methods in org.jdrupes.httpcodec with type parameters of type HttpField 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends HttpField<?>>
      T      		 HttpRequest.getHeader(java.lang.Class<T> type, java.lang.String name)
      Returns the header field with the given type and name or null if no such header is set.
      <T extends HttpField<?>>
      T      		 HttpResponse.getHeader(java.lang.Class<T> type, java.lang.String name)
      Returns the header field with the given type and name or null if no such header is set.
      Methods in org.jdrupes.httpcodec that return types with arguments of type HttpField 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,HttpField<?>> HttpRequest.headers()
      Returns all headers as unmodifiable map.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,HttpField<?>> HttpResponse.headers()
      Returns all headers as unmodifiable map.
      Methods in org.jdrupes.httpcodec with parameters of type HttpField 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void HttpRequest.setHeader(HttpField<?> value)
      Set a header for the request.
      void HttpResponse.setHeader(HttpField<?> field)
      Set a header for the response data.

    • Uses of HttpField in org.jdrupes.httpcodec.fields

      Subclasses of HttpField in org.jdrupes.httpcodec.fields 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HttpContentLengthField
      A specialization of HttpIntField that represents the content-length.
      class  HttpIntField
      An HTTP field value that is an integer.
      class  HttpListField<T>
      An HTTP field value that consists of a comma separated list of strings.
      class  HttpMediaTypeField
      Represents a header field's value and provides methods for interpreting that value.
      class  HttpStringField
      Represents a header field's value and provides methods for interpreting that value.
      class  HttpStringListField
      An HTTP field value that consists of a comma separated list of strings.
      Methods in org.jdrupes.httpcodec.fields that return HttpField 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static HttpField<?> HttpField.fromString(java.lang.String fieldName, java.lang.String fieldValue)
      Returns an HttpField that represents the given header field, using the best matching derived class in this package.
